name: Cheating at Grandma's Saturday Night Bingo
name_original: Cheating at Grandma's Saturday Night Bingo
description:
Cheating at Grandma's Saturday Night Bingo is a replica of the original luck based game "Bingo", but here you can cheat! Switch the numbers around on your cardboard, and do it even with the called numbers. You can make many combinations and even have the same number several times!

Will you be able to win at bingo? Or will grandma and her friends win you?

The game can be controlled using exclusively the mouse, only using the left click.

Credits:

  • The game design, programming, art & UI is made exclusively by me.
  • The music is taken from a pack called Silly Comedy Music Pack made by WOW Sound
  • The SFX excepts for the numbers are taken from a pack called Anime Comedy Sound Effect Pack made by WOW Sound
  • The numbers SFX are taken from a pack called Number and Letters and Everything that Goes with Them made by B. Patrick
